newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Yield 6.1126 pct on Portuguese 91-day bills.
newsitem.headline: Yield 6.1126 pct on Portuguese 91-day bills.

text.p: The average yield rose to 6.1126 percent, from 6.1120 percent previously, at the Institute for Public Credit Management's sale of 91-day bills, the Bank of Portugal said.
